title: Adventure RPG Music
description: Inspired by classic RPG and Action Adventure games. Immerse players into your world with driving orchestral cues, sweeping ambiences and iconic themes!
longDescription:

What’s included:

This pack includes full length, loopable tracks - many of which include alternate versions for extra use and customization in game. Also included are a range of incidental cues and stingers. Many tracks have been written to allow for vertical remixing with other tracks! (e.g., Action Final Stand and Action Skirmish)


High quality:

This pack was composed, produced & mastered with Professional, Industry-standard software & hardware, as well as Live studio musicians. These tracks create an exceptional soundtrack that will elevate your game! 


All tracks Royalty Free & Youtube Safe!


Learn more here! https://joeosterstock.com/


Attributions:

Artwork by Kate “Catto” Osterstock

Fog overlay footage by premiumbeat
technicalDetails:
Features :

  • 68 original stereo WAV tracks (16-bit / 44.1KHz) 
  • 21 music loops
  • 1 hour & 26 minutes of music 
  • Royalty-Free license


Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
